title: League of legends is broken
body: SO LEAGUE CAN U FCKING FIX YOUR QUEUING SYSTEM.TIHS GAME IS SO BROKEN HOW CAN I FCKING START WITH FCKING NOOBS.ITS SO TILTING TO BE THE ONLY ONE TRYING TO SAVE UR DIVISION AND YOU GET A FULL TEAM OF TROLLS THAT CANT EVEN FARM OR GO AFK FOR LIKE NO REASON JUST BECAUSE THEY ARE CRYBABYES THAT SUCK AT THIS GAME AND NEED TO BE PERMABANNED.PLS JUST FCKING FIX IT.IM GOLD 3 AND IM QUEUING WITH BRONZE PPL.HOW IS THAT POSIBLEE LEAGUE.I HOPE THIS MESSAGE GETS TO A EMPLOYEE AND HE JUST FIX IT.THIS GAME SUCKS BALLS DUDE.FIX UR FCKING GAME.IT SUCKS BECAUSE EVERY LITTLE KID THAT GOES MID AND DIES LIKE 123012730120 TIMES FOR 10 MINS NEED TO BE BANNED.U BANNED TILER1 BUT NO THE NOOBS STAY THERE AND TROLLS PPLS GAMES.FIX UR FCKING GAME GARBAGE BRAINDEAD DOGOS.
